pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.              

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the opening of the second Global Conference for Media Freedom, co-hosted by Canada and Botswana.

The conference will be streamed online at https://www.international.gc.ca/campaign-campagne/media_freedom-liberte_presse-2020/index.aspx?lang=eng
